Body: Description: The customer needs assistance setting up the AD_ActivityCollection Job. The DC agent is currently monitored by NTP, and the log is being stored in NAM.
What We've Learned Updated: The AD_ActivityCollection Job in the Netwrix Access Analyzer (Netwrix Enterprise Auditor) is not configured to collect data.
Next Steps Updated: Sending the information with the steps on how to configure the AD_ActivityCollection Job

Steps to Reproduce Updated: Launch the NAA console
Expand the Active Directory group
Expand 6.Activity
Expand the 0.Collection and select the AD_ActivityCollection
